about_the_game:
Step into an impossible place: endless yellow corridors that stretch beyond the laws of physics, where every turn leads deeper into a reality that shouldn't exist. Armed with nothing but a VHS camera, explore an uncanny maze where the absence of threat becomes a threat itself.

BACKROOMS 0 strips away traditional horror game elements to create something more primal - a pure psychological experience where your imagination becomes your worst enemy. No jump scares. No monsters. Just you, the hum of fluorescent lights, and the growing certainty that these halls are watching.

- Pure atmospheric horror - no monsters, puzzles, or objectives to distract from the experience

- Authentic VHS camera aesthetics for documenting your journey

- Multiple distinct areas, each more abstract and unsettling than the last

- Minimalist sound design: fluorescent buzzing, echoing footsteps, crushing silence

- Zero UI elements or interruptions to break the immersion

Are you brave enough to face the vast emptiness of the Backrooms?

Inspired by the concept of the Backrooms, this is a standalone game that, while drawing inspiration from the wider Backrooms phenomenon, has no connection to Kane Pixels' work or the Backrooms Wiki and Fandom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430, 3.0GHz or AMD FX-6300 or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 265 with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570, 3.3GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Backrooms walking simulator. No entities lurk here, just the unnerving emptiness and dream-like isolation of the infinite maze. Feel mounting dread and strange nostalgia as you wander deeper into liminal spaces with your VHS camera.
